queryinfo.query-statement: SELECT BOARD_TP_SEQ , BOARD_KND_CD , dbo.FN_CODEBOOK('COM009', BOARD_KND_CD) AS BOARD_KND , BOARD_NM , USE_F , LUP_ORD , dbo.FN_USER(RG_ID, '') AS RG_NM , RG_DT + ' ' + RG_TM AS RG_DTM , dbo.FN_USER(MDF_ID, '') AS MDF_NM , MDF_DT + ' ' + MDF_TM AS MDF_DTM FROM UC_COM_BOARD_TYPE WHERE BOARD_TP_SEQ IN (SELECT BOARD_TP_SEQ FROM UC_COM_BOARD_AUTH E, UC_COM_USER F WHERE E.OBJ_GRD_CD = GRD_CD AND F.USER_ID = ?) AND BOARD_TP_SEQ NOT IN (22) @board_knd @board_nm @use_f ORDER BY BOARD_KND_CD, LUP_ORD

INSERT INTO UC_COM_BOARD_TYPE ( BOARD_NM , BOARD_KND_CD , USE_F , LUP_ORD , RG_DT , RG_TM , RG_ID , MDF_DT , MDF_TM , MDF_ID ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? )

UPDATE UC_COM_BOARD_TYPE SET BOARD_NM = ? , BOARD_KND_CD = ? , USE_F = ? , LUP_ORD = ? , MDF_DT = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , MDF_TM = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , MDF_ID = ? WHERE BOARD_TP_SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM UC_COM_BOARD_TYPE WHERE BOARD_TP_SEQ = ?

SELECT 0 AS CHK , A.BOARD_TP_SEQ , OBJ_GRD_CD , dbo.FN_CODEBOOK('SYS007', OBJ_GRD_CD) AS GRADE , ISNULL(A.READ_AUTH_F, 0) AS R_AUTH_F , ISNULL(A.WRT_AUTH_F, 0) AS W_AUTH_F FROM UC_COM_BOARD_AUTH A WHERE A.BOARD_TP_SEQ = ? ORDER BY OBJ_GRD_CD

SELECT 0 AS CHK , CODE AS OBJ_GRD_CD , CODE_NM AS GRADE , 1 AS R_AUTH_F , 0 AS W_AUTH_F FROM UC_COM_CODEBOOK WHERE UP_CD = 'SYS007' AND CODE <> '000' AND CODE NOT IN( SELECT OBJ_GRD_CD FROM UC_COM_BOARD_AUTH WHERE BOARD_TP_SEQ = ?) ORDER BY CODE

INSERT INTO UC_COM_BOARD_AUTH ( BOARD_TP_SEQ , OBJ_GRD_CD , READ_AUTH_F , WRT_AUTH_F , RG_DT , RG_TM , RG_ID , MDF_DT , MDF_TM , MDF_ID )VALUES( ? , ? , ? , ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? )

UPDATE UC_COM_BOARD_AUTH SET READ_AUTH_F = ? , WRT_AUTH_F = ? , MDF_DT = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , MDF_TM = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , MDF_ID = ? WHERE BOARD_TP_SEQ = ? AND OBJ_GRD_CD = ?
DELETE FROM UC_COM_BOARD_AUTH WHERE BOARD_TP_SEQ = ? AND OBJ_GRD_CD = ?

SELECT A.BOARD_TP_SEQ , A.BOARD_NM FROM UC_COM_BOARD_TYPE A, UC_COM_BOARD_AUTH B WHERE A.BOARD_TP_SEQ = B.BOARD_TP_SEQ AND A.BOARD_KND_CD = '02' AND B.OBJ_GRD_CD = ? AND A.BOARD_TP_SEQ NOT IN (17, 22) ORDER BY lup_ord
SELECT READ_AUTH_F , WRT_AUTH_F FROM UC_COM_BOARD_AUTH a, UC_COM_USER B WHERE BOARD_TP_SEQ = ? AND b.USER_ID = ? AND obj_grd_cd = grd_Cd AND BOARD_TP_SEQ NOT IN (22)

SELECT A.BOARD_TP_SEQ AS CODE , A.BOARD_NM AS CODENM FROM UC_COM_BOARD_TYPE A, UC_COM_BOARD_AUTH B WHERE A.BOARD_TP_SEQ = B.BOARD_TP_SEQ AND A.BOARD_KND_CD = '02' AND B.OBJ_GRD_CD = ? ORDER BY lup_ord

SELECT A.BOARD_ID , A.BOARD_NM , A.USE_F , B.USER_ID , B.R_AUTH , B.W_AUTH , B.D_AUTH , DECODE(B.R_AUTH, '1', '▣', '□') AS R_AUTH_SPAN , DECODE(B.W_AUTH, '1', '▣', '□') AS W_AUTH_SPAN , DECODE(B.D_AUTH, '1', '▣', '□') AS D_AUTH_SPAN FROM UC_COM_BOARD A, UC_COM_BOARD_INSP_OBJ B WHERE A.BOARD_ID = ? AND B.USER_ID(+) = ? AND A.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID(+)

SELECT row_number() over(ORDER BY A.BOARD_SEQ DESC) rnum , A.BOARD_SEQ , A.BOARD_TP_SEQ , C.BOARD_NM , A.BOARD_SBJT , A.BOARD_CONT , A.QRY_CNT , A.RPLY_CNT , B.USER_NM AS RG_NM , A.RG_DT + ' ' + A.RG_TM AS RG_DTM , dbo.FN_USER(A.MDF_ID, '') AS MDF_NM , A.MDF_DT + ' ' + A.MDF_TM AS MDF_DTM , A.RG_ID , A.MDF_ID , (SELECT COUNT(file_seq) FROM UC_COM_FILE WHERE prg_id='BOARD' AND up_seq=A.BOARD_SEQ) filecnt , (SELECT COUNT(board_seq) FROM UC_COM_BOARD_RPLY D WHERE A.BOARD_SEQ = D.BOARD_SEQ) AS rply_cnt FROM UC_COM_BOARD A, UC_COM_USER B, UC_COM_BOARD_TYPE C WHERE A.RG_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.BOARD_TP_SEQ = C.BOARD_TP_SEQ AND A.RG_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? AND A.BOARD_TP_SEQ IN (SELECT BOARD_TP_SEQ FROM UC_COM_BOARD_AUTH E, UC_COM_USER F WHERE E.OBJ_GRD_CD = F.GRD_CD AND F.USER_ID = ?) AND A.BOARD_TP_SEQ NOT IN (17, 22) @board_tp_seq @searchType @searchText @q_board_sbjt @q_board_cont --ORDER BY A.BOARD_SEQ DESC

INSERT INTO UC_COM_BOARD ( BOARD_TP_SEQ , BOARD_SBJT , BOARD_CONT , QRY_CNT , RPLY_CNT , RG_DT , RG_TM , RG_ID , MDF_DT , MDF_TM , MDF_ID ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , 0 , 0 , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? )
SELECT IDENT_CURRENT('UC_COM_BOARD') AS seq
UPDATE UC_COM_BOARD SET BOARD_SBJT = ? , BOARD_CONT = ? , MDF_DT = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , MDF_TM = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , MDF_ID = ? WHERE BOARD_SEQ = ?
UPDATE UC_COM_BOARD SET @filenm , MDF_DT = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , MDF_TM = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , MDF_ID = ? WHERE BOARD_SEQ = ?
SELECT A.BOARD_CONT , (SELECT BOARD_NM FROM UC_COM_BOARD_TYPE WHERE BOARD_TP_SEQ =A.BOARD_TP_SEQ) BOARD_NM --공통 - 임시로 가져온다 FROM UC_COM_BOARD A WHERE A.BOARD_SEQ = ?
UPDATE UC_COM_BOARD SET QRY_CNT = QRY_CNT+1 , MDF_DT = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , MDF_TM = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , MDF_ID = ? WHERE BOARD_SEQ = ?
UPDATE UC_COM_BOARD SET qry_cnt = qry_cnt + 1 WHERE board_seq = ? AND rg_id <> ?
UPDATE UC_COM_BOARD SET RPLY_CNT = RPLY_CNT+1 , MDF_DT = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , MDF_TM = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , MDF_ID = ? WHERE BOARD_SEQ = ?
UPDATE UC_COM_BOARD SET RPLY_CNT = RPLY_CNT-1 , MDF_DT = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , MDF_TM = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , MDF_ID = ? WHERE BOARD_SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM UC_COM_BOARD WHERE BOARD_SEQ = ?

SELECT BOARD_SEQ , RPLY_SEQ , RPLY_CONT --, RG_DT+' '+RG_TM AS RPLY_RG_DTM , dbo.FN_USER(RG_ID, '') AS RPLY_RG_NM --, MDF_DT+' '+MDF_TM AS RPLY_MDF_DTM --, dbo.FN_USER(MDF_ID, '') AS RPLY_MDF_NM --, SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CAST(rg_dt as DATETIME), 102),3,8)+' ' --+ SUBSTRING(rg_tm,1,2)+':'+SUBSTRING(rg_tm,3,2) RPLY_RG_DTM , REPLACE(substring(dbo.uf_sysdate(MDF_DT+MDF_TM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS',''),3,14),'-','.') RPLY_RG_DTM , RG_ID FROM UC_COM_BOARD_RPLY WHERE BOARD_SEQ = ? ORDER BY RPLY_SEQ ASC

INSERT INTO UC_COM_BOARD_RPLY ( BOARD_SEQ , RPLY_CONT , RG_DT , RG_TM , RG_ID , MDF_DT , MDF_TM , MDF_ID ) VALUES ( ? , ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? )
UPDATE UC_COM_BOARD_RPLY SET RPLY_CONT = ? , MDF_DT = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , MDF_TM = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , MDF_ID = ? WHERE RPLY_SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM UC_COM_BOARD_RPLY WHERE RPLY_SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM UC_COM_BOARD_RPLY WHERE BOARD_SEQ = ?

INSERT INTO UC_COM_FILE ( up_seq, prg_id, file_nm, new_file_nm , rg_dt, rg_tm, rg_id, mdf_dt, mdf_tm, mdf_id ) SELECT (SELECT IDENT_CURRENT('UC_COM_BOARD')), ?, ?, ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ?
DELETE FROM UC_COM_FILE WHERE prg_id = ? AND up_seq = ? @file_seq

SELECT A.DATA_SEQ , A.DATA_SBJT , A.ATCH_FILE_NM , A.RG_DT+' '+A.RG_TM AS RG_DTM , B.USER_NM AS RG_NM , A.MDF_DT+' '+A.MDF_TM AS MDF_DTM , DBO.FN_USER(A.MDF_ID, '') AS MDF_NM , A.DATA_CONT , B.USER_NM +' ['+B.USER_ID+']' AS RG_NM_ID FROM UC_COM_DATA A, UC_COM_USER B WHERE A.RG_ID = B.USER_ID @data_sbjt @data_cont @user_nm @user_id @atch_file_nm ORDER BY A.DATA_SEQ DESC

INSERT INTO UC_COM_DATA ( DATA_SBJT , DATA_CONT , ATCH_FILE_NM , RG_DT , RG_TM , RG_ID , MDF_DT , MDF_TM , MDF_ID )VALUES( ? , ? , ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? )

UPDATE UC_COM_DATA SET DATA_SBJT = ? , DATA_CONT = ? , ATCH_FILE_NM = ? , MDF_DT = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , MDF_TM = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , MDF_ID = ? WHERE DATA_SEQ = ?
UPDATE UC_COM_DATA SET ATCH_FILE_NM = '' , MDF_DT = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , MDF_TM = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , MDF_ID = ? WHERE DATA_SEQ = ?
DELETE UC_COM_DATA WHERE DATA_SEQ = ?
SELECT PRJ_SEQ , PRJ_NM FROM UC_PRJ WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) BETWEEN RL_ST_DT AND RL_END_DT ORDER BY PRJ_SEQ
UPDATE UC_INF_QNA SET QRY_CNT = QRY_CNT + 1 WHERE QNA_SEQ = ? AND QUEST_MN_ID <> ?

SELECT QNA_SEQ , QUEST_TITLE , PRJ_SEQ , (SELECT PRJ_NM FROM UC_PRJ WHERE PRJ_SEQ=A.PRJ_SEQ) PRJ_NM , QUEST_TYPE , QUEST_MN_ID , DBO.FN_USER(QUEST_MN_ID,'') QUEST_MN_NM , DBO.FN_USER(ANSW_MN_ID,'') ANSW_MN_NM , PROC_STAT , dbo.FN_CODEBOOK('INF001', PROC_STAT) AS PROC_STAT_NM , QRY_CNT , 0 RPLY_CNT , DBO.UF_SYSDATE(REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS','') REG_DT , DBO.UF_SYSDATE(CHG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS','') CHG_DT , DBO.FN_USER(REG_USER_ID,'') REG_USER_NM , DBO.FN_USER(CHG_USER_ID,'') CHG_USER_NM , QUEST_CNTN , ANSW_CNTN , (CASE WHEN ANSW_DT IS NOT NULL THEN DBO.UF_SYSDATE(ANSW_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS','') ELSE ANSW_DT END) ANSW_DT FROM UC_INF_QNA A WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND QNA_SEQ = ?

INSERT INTO UC_INF_QNA ( QUEST_TITLE , QUEST_CNTN , PRJ_SEQ , QUEST_TYPE , QUEST_MN_ID , PROC_STAT , QRY_CNT , RPLY_CNT , USE_YN , REG_USER_ID , REG_DT , CHG_USER_ID , CHG_DT ) VALUES ( ? , ?, ?, ?, ? , '01', 0, 0, 'Y' , ? , REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR , GETDATE(), 120), '-', ''), ':', ''), ' ', '') , ? , REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR , GETDATE(), 120), '-', ''), ':', ''), ' ', '') )
SELECT IDENT_CURRENT('UC_INF_QNA') AS qna_seq

UPDATE UC_INF_QNA SET QUEST_TITLE = ? , QUEST_CNTN = ? , PRJ_SEQ = ? , QUEST_TYPE = ? , CHG_DT = REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR , GETDATE(), 120), '-', ''), ':', ''), ' ', '') , CHG_USER_ID = ? WHERE QNA_SEQ = ?
DELETE UC_INF_QNA WHERE QNA_SEQ = ?
UPDATE UC_INF_QNA SET USE_YN = 'N' , CHG_DT = REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR , GETDATE(), 120), '-', ''), ':', ''), ' ', '') , CHG_USER_ID = ? WHERE QNA_SEQ = ?

UPDATE UC_INF_QNA SET ANSW_CNTN = ? , PROC_STAT = ? , ANSW_MN_ID = ? , ANSW_DT = (CASE WHEN ?='03' THEN REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR , GETDATE(), 120), '-', ''), ':', ''), ' ', '') ELSE NULL END) , CHG_DT = REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR , GETDATE(), 120), '-', ''), ':', ''), ' ', '') , CHG_USER_ID = ? WHERE QNA_SEQ = ?
DELETE UC_COM_ANW WHERE QST_SEQ = ?

INSERT INTO UC_COM_ANW ( QST_SEQ , ANW_CONT , USE_F , RG_DT , RG_TM , RG_ID , MDF_DT , MDF_TM , MDF_ID )VALUES( ? , ? , 'Y' , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? )
DELETE UC_COM_ANW WHERE ANW_SEQ = ?

SELECT notice_seq , notice_seq AS seq , notice_type , notice_type AS notice_type_nm , notice_sbjt , qry_cnt , rg_id , dbo.FN_USER(rg_id, '') AS rg_nm , rg_dt , rg_tm , mdf_id , mdf_dt , mdf_tm , dbo.FN_USER(mdf_id, '') AS mdf_nm , valid_strt_dt , valid_end_dt , notice_cont , board_tp_seq , pwd FROM UC_COM_NOTICE A WHERE BOARD_TP_SEQ = ? @q_datefrom @q_dateto @notice_type @q_notice_sbjt @q_notice_cont @q_rg_id ORDER BY notice_type DESC, notice_seq DESC
SELECT notice_cont FROM UC_COM_NOTICE WHERE notice_seq = ?

INSERT INTO UC_COM_NOTICE ( notice_type , notice_sbjt , notice_cont, qry_cnt, board_tp_seq , valid_strt_dt , valid_end_dt , pwd , rg_id , rg_dt , rg_tm , mdf_id , mdf_dt , mdf_tm ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, 0, ? , ?, ?, ? , ?, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112), REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ?, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112), REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') )

UPDATE UC_COM_NOTICE SET notice_type = ? , notice_sbjt = ? , notice_cont = ? , valid_strt_dt = ? , valid_end_dt = ? , pwd = ? , mdf_id = ? , mdf_dt = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , mdf_tm = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') WHERE notice_seq = ?
UPDATE UC_COM_NOTICE SET qry_cnt = qry_cnt + 1 WHERE notice_seq = ? AND rg_id <> ?
DELETE FROM UC_COM_NOTICE WHERE notice_seq = ?
SELECT IDENT_CURRENT('UC_COM_NOTICE') AS seq
SELECT USER_NM, USER_ID, '0' AS CHK FROM UC_COM_USER

INSERT INTO UC_COM_MSG( send_dt , send_tm , send_id, recv_id , recv_dt , recv_tm , read_yn, title, contents)
values(
CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') ,?,? ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') ,'N',?,? )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM uc_com_msg WHERE recv_id = ? AND read_yn = 'N'

SELECT '1' as chk, a.read_yn, a.send_dt, a.send_tm, a.title, a.send_id, a.contents, b.user_nm as send_nm FROM UC_COM_MSG a, UC_COM_USER b WHERE recv_id = ? AND b.user_id = a.send_id ORDER BY send_dt DESC, send_tm DESC
DELETE FROM UC_COM_MSG WHERE send_dt = ? AND send_tm = ? AND send_id = ? AND recv_id = ?
UPDATE UC_COM_MSG SET read_yn = 'Y' WHERE send_dt = ? AND send_tm = ? AND send_id = ? AND recv_id = ?

UPDATE UC_COM_NOTICE SET notice_type = ? , notice_sbjt = ? , notice_cont = ? , valid_strt_dt = ? , valid_end_dt = ? , mdf_id = ? , mdf_dt = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , mdf_tm = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') WHERE notice_seq = ?

SELECT QNA_SEQ , RPLY_SEQ , RPLY_CNTN , REG_USER_ID , dbo.FN_USER(REG_USER_ID, '') AS REG_USER_NM , REPLACE(SUBSTRING(DBO.UF_SYSDATE(CHG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS',''),3,14),'-','.') RPLY_CHG_DT FROM UC_INF_QNA_RPLY WHERE QNA_SEQ = ? ORDER BY RPLY_SEQ ASC

INSERT INTO UC_INF_QNA_RPLY ( QNA_SEQ , RPLY_CNTN , REG_DT , REG_USER_ID , CHG_DT , CHG_USER_ID ) VALUES ( ? , ? , REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR , GETDATE(), 120), '-', ''), ':', ''), ' ', '') , ? , REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR , GETDATE(), 120), '-', ''), ':', ''), ' ', '') , ? )
DELETE FROM UC_INF_QNA_RPLY WHERE RPLY_SEQ = ?
UPDATE UC_INF_QNA_RPLY SET RPLY_CNTN = ? , CHG_USER_ID = ? , CHG_DT = REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR , GETDATE(), 120), '-', ''), ':', ''), ' ', '') WHERE RPLY_SEQ = ?
UPDATE UC_INF_QNA SET RPLY_CNT = RPLY_CNT+1 , CHG_DT = REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR , GETDATE(), 120), '-', ''), ':', ''), ' ', '') , CHG_USER_ID = ? WHERE QNA_SEQ = ?
UPDATE UC_INF_QNA SET RPLY_CNT = RPLY_CNT-1 , CHG_DT = REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR , GETDATE(), 120), '-', ''), ':', ''), ' ', '') , CHG_USER_ID = ? WHERE QNA_SEQ = ?
SELECT BOARD_TP_SEQ , BOARD_NM FROM UC_COM_BOARD_TYPE WHERE BOARD_KND_CD = '03' AND USE_F = 'Y' ORDER BY LUP_ORD

INSERT INTO UC_COM_FILE ( UP_SEQ , PRG_ID , FILE_NM , NEW_FILE_NM , RG_DT , RG_TM , RG_ID , MDF_DT , MDF_TM , MDF_ID ) (SELECT IDENT_CURRENT('UC_COM_NOTICE'), ?, ?, ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112), REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR , GETDATE(), 108), ':', ''), ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112), REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR , GETDATE(), 108), ':', ''), ? )

SELECT row_number() over(ORDER BY A.BOARD_SEQ DESC) rnum , A.BOARD_SEQ , A.BOARD_TP_SEQ , C.BOARD_NM , A.BOARD_SBJT , A.BOARD_CONT , A.QRY_CNT , A.RPLY_CNT , B.USER_NM AS RG_NM , A.RG_DT , A.RG_DT + ' ' + A.RG_TM AS RG_DTM , dbo.FN_USER(A.MDF_ID, '') AS MDF_NM , A.MDF_DT + ' ' + A.MDF_TM AS MDF_DTM , A.MDF_DT , A.RG_ID , A.MDF_ID , (SELECT COUNT(file_seq) FROM UC_COM_FILE WHERE prg_id='BOARD' AND up_seq=A.BOARD_SEQ) filecnt , (SELECT COUNT(board_seq) FROM UC_COM_BOARD_RPLY D WHERE A.BOARD_SEQ = D.BOARD_SEQ) AS rply_cnt FROM UC_COM_BOARD A, UC_COM_USER B, UC_COM_BOARD_TYPE C WHERE A.RG_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.BOARD_TP_SEQ = C.BOARD_TP_SEQ @board_tp_seq @msearch @msearch ORDER BY A.BOARD_SEQ DESC

SELECT A.BOARD_SEQ , A.BOARD_TP_SEQ , C.BOARD_NM , A.BOARD_SBJT , A.BOARD_CONT , A.QRY_CNT , A.RPLY_CNT , B.USER_NM AS RG_NM , A.RG_DT , A.RG_TM , REPLACE(substring(dbo.uf_sysdate(A.RG_DT+A.RG_TM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS',''),3,14),'-','.') AS RG_DTM , dbo.FN_USER(A.MDF_ID, '') AS MDF_NM , REPLACE(substring(dbo.uf_sysdate(A.MDF_DT+A.MDF_TM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS',''),3,14),'-','.') AS MDF_DTM , A.MDF_DT , A.RG_ID , A.MDF_ID , (SELECT COUNT(file_seq) FROM UC_COM_FILE WHERE prg_id='BOARD' AND up_seq=A.BOARD_SEQ) filecnt , (SELECT COUNT(board_seq) FROM UC_COM_BOARD_RPLY D WHERE A.BOARD_SEQ = D.BOARD_SEQ) AS rply_cnt FROM UC_COM_BOARD A, UC_COM_USER B, UC_COM_BOARD_TYPE C WHERE A.RG_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.BOARD_TP_SEQ = C.BOARD_TP_SEQ AND A.BOARD_SEQ = ?

SELECT A.BOARD_SEQ , A.BOARD_TP_SEQ , A.BOARD_SBJT , A.BOARD_CONT , A.QRY_CNT , A.RPLY_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(board_seq) FROM UC_COM_BOARD_RPLY D WHERE A.BOARD_SEQ = D.BOARD_SEQ) AS rply_cnt , 'prev1' AS type FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY board_seq DESC) AS rnum , * FROM uc_com_board WHERE board_seq < ? AND board_tp_seq = ? ) a WHERE a.rnum = 1 UNION ALL SELECT A.BOARD_SEQ , A.BOARD_TP_SEQ , A.BOARD_SBJT , A.BOARD_CONT , A.QRY_CNT , A.RPLY_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(board_seq) FROM UC_COM_BOARD_RPLY D WHERE A.BOARD_SEQ = D.BOARD_SEQ) AS rply_cnt , 'next1' AS type FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY board_seq ASC) AS rnum , * FROM uc_com_board WHERE board_seq > ? AND board_tp_seq = ? ) a WHERE a.rnum = 1

RPLY_RG_DTM , RG_ID FROM UC_COM_BOARD_RPLY WHERE BOARD_SEQ = ? ORDER BY RPLY_SEQ ASC
